desc:
Did you know my bank account has a Waystone set up? It's called Patreon but you can only teleport money into it.  

 

Waystones is a mod that adds waystone blocks that the player can return to once they've been activated, either through a Return Scroll, a Warp Stone or if enabled, a button in the inventory screen.

 

Depending on its configuration it can be used in Survival Mode, for Adventure Maps or by Server Owners as an alternative to /warp or /home commands.

 

Features

  • Waystones
    • Craftable in Survival Mode
    • Players can set up waystones as a way of teleporting between locations
  • Return Scroll
    • Lets you return to the last activated waystone
    • One time use item, will be used up
  • Warp Stone
    • Lets you choose to which (activated) waystone to return to
    • Will not be used up, but has a cooldown period (bound to the player, not the item)
  • Return / Warp Button
    • Lets you return to the last activated waystone OR choose to which (activated) waystone to return to
    • Can be used for free, but has a cooldown period
    • Disabled by default, can be restricted to only allow returns
  • Chance of spawning in villages (can be disabled)

Mod Showcase by MrAshleeD

 

Useful Links
